items.title: iRacing Setup | Porsche 911 GT3 R (992) @ Spa
items.description:
Hello, I'm Miguel San Martin, I have been in sim racing for 10 years now and I managed to gain a lot of experience in terms of racing experience and setup manufacturing. 

This .sto file has been setup for use with the Porsche 911 GT3 R (992) @ Spa
items.longDescription:
Hello, I'm Miguel San Martin, I have been in sim racing for 10 years now and I managed to gain a lot of experience in terms of racing experience and setup manufacturing. 

This .sto file has been setup for use with the Porsche 911 GT3 R (992) @ Spa
items.author: Miguel San Martin
requirements: Porsche 911 GT3 R (992) content purchased in iRacing
Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps content purchased in iRacing
installation: Download the .sto file from the provided link.
Place the .sto file into the corresponding car/track folder.
Launch iRacing and select the setup from the 'Garage' tab before entering the session.

files.name: Porsche_911_GT3_R__992_Spa2025S3Baseline.sto
files.description: Setup file for Porsche 911 GT3 R (992) at Spa for iRacing Season 2025 S3.
